entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norman Wells
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norman Wells Airport 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.3°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
